text:
when I try to download the files using http port ie 8080, the files are getting downloaded properly. wehn I use ajp port, the same file is downloading with some junk characters.

please help me to resolve the issue
creator: t.sudhakar@blr.stpi.in
chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> when I try to download the files using http port ie 8080, the files are
> getting downloaded properly. wehn I use ajp port, the same file is
> downloading with some junk characters.
> 
> please help me to resolve the issue

Bugzilla is not a support forum.  Post your query on the Tomcat user's mailing list, with some real information.  Just saying it doesn't work will only annoy people.

You might want to read this:
http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html

Also, your reported version of Tomcat is seriously outdated.  Move up.

creator: t.sudhakar@blr.stpi.in
text: Thank you for your suggestion and comment chuck caldarale

creator: markt@apache.org
text: *** Bug 53488 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
